fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Starve up to two players each day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- A Starved player will be notified once the night begins. If they use any ability in the night, they will be killed.
- You will visit either target to kill them, should they try anything while starving.
- If you're empowered, you will kill your first target even if they don't do anything. Your first target will not be notified that this will happen.
- Empowerment will apply to you in the day after you get Empowered, rather than the night.
- Conversion and Roleblock Immune
